Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Dirtbike
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A basic off-road motorcycle, the Dirtbike is a very cheap vehicle that allows a single user to travel quickly, efficiently and quietly. Incredibly light and practically paper-thin on armour, it performs poorly in the winter or in the snow, or both, and has absolutely no cargo capacity.

Similar to other tier 1 vehicles, this is a gas guzzler and best used for medium distances.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
